Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a WebSocket handler for shell communication that manages bidirectional data transfer between local and remote connections, including connection upgrading, message forwarding, and proper connection cleanup.

Struct Description: The Shell struct represents a shell session manager that maintains active connections and handles WebSocket communication for shell data transfer.

Fields:
- Name: string - Identifier for the shell session
- links: map[string]*Link - Map of active connections indexed by connection ID
- RWMutex: sync.RWMutex - Synchronization primitive for thread-safe access to the links map

Methods:
- WS: (conn *conn.Conn, w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) -> None - Handles WebSocket upgrade and manages bidirectional data forwarding between local and remote connections
- localForward: (id string, local *websocket.Conn) -> None - Reads data from local WebSocket connection and forwards to remote
- remoteForward: (id string, local *websocket.Conn) -> None - Reads data from remote connection and forwards to local WebSocket
